    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description>Updaing people search query to add roles check for snc_internal roles</description>
        <name>Ex SP - fix People search on installing </name>
        <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[if(new GlidePluginManager().isActive('com.snc.employee_center_pro')){
    var gr = new GlideRecord('ais_search_source');
    gr.get('9c88954f53171010069addeeff7b1220');
    if(gr.getValue('condition').includes("^roles=snc_internal"))
    {
        gs.info("role already linked.");
    }
    else
    {
        gs.info("role is not linked. adding link");
        gr.setValue('condition',gr.getValue('condition').concat("^roles=snc_internal"));
        gr.update()
    }
}]]></script>
